publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2560 Richard Baker:Aberdeen Jobcentre—That the Parliament notes the excellent efforts by staff at the Jobcentre Plus in Chapel Street, Aberdeen, in beating its targets for filling job vacancies; congratulates the staff for winning the organisation’s top award for 2004 in reflection of their efforts in securing more than 150 jobs against a target of 64 in the last three months of 2004, and supports the Jobcentre in continuing its successful work in reducing unemployment in Aberdeen.

S2M-2560 Richard Baker:Aberdeen Jobcentre—That the Parliament notes the excellent efforts by staff at the Jobcentre Plus in Chapel Street, Aberdeen, in beating its targets for filling job vacancies; congratulates the staff for winning the organisation’s top award for 2004 in reflection of their efforts in securing more than 150 jobs against a target of 64 in the last three months of 2004, and supports the Jobcentre in continuing its successful work in reducing unemployment in Aberdeen.
S2M-2560 Aberdeen Jobcentre (lodged on 9 March 2005) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-2560 Aberdeen Jobcentre (lodged on 9 March 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
